title: decrypt disk encryption
extract: How to decrypt Full Disk EncryptionAcquire a memory image of or take the hiberfil.sys file from the target computer.Create an encrypted disk image (not required for TrueCrypt/VeraCrypt).Run Passware Kit to recover the encryption keys and decrypt the hard disk.4 days ago
extract_html:
How to decrypt Full Disk Encryption
  1. Acquire a memory image of or take the hiberfil.sys file from the target computer.
  2. Create an encrypted disk image (not required for TrueCrypt/VeraCrypt).
  3. Run Passware Kit to recover the encryption keys and decrypt the hard disk.
4 days ago
